WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is a problem with the Monaco editor; we'll let them know.
WorkItem.Description:
I am using Visual Studion Online Monaco to code in typescript

import Collections = require('lib/collections');

If I 'go to definition' on the path I get navigated to the appropriate file. However, if I click 'go to definition' anywhere else on the line I am navigated to same line. Might be better if I always get navigated to the appropriate file.

Also, ctrl + click on 'require' works, but 'go to definition' on 'require' does not work.

thanks
WorkItem.Summary: 'Go to definition' should navigate to imported files more often
